text: teni a vatathi sulaimana hasi padya ane du'a karava lagya ke, he palanahara! Tum mane tauphika apa ke hum tari te ne'amatono abhara manum, je tem mara para ane mara matapita para kari che. Ane hum eva satkaryo karato rahum jena karane tum raji tha'i jaya, mane potani krpathi sadacari lokomam kari de
